body:
Hi Hui-ling,

I can see that Chris has already answered to a number of your questions in an email. Can you update me here that which questions are still valid? Also I suggest to post your questions one by one as it will be much easier to help.

Also please update your components to the latest version. That may solve couple of issues that you have here.

Back to your question about fenestration, if it is a regular perforated screen then you can use mixedFunctions, otherwise you can just create the geometry as a brep and put it in front of the window. Are they dynamic or just fixed shadings?

Mostapha
